actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide that the term "dependent child" includes a needy child living with the father, mother, or any other relative, of such child.

summary.text: Amends the program of Aid to Families with Dependent Children under Title IV of the Social Security Act to provide that the term "dependent child" includes a needy child living with the father, mother, or any other relative of such child.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide that the term "dependent child" includes a needy child living with the father, mother, or any other relative, of such child.
